page.title: 01Colden Common:Introduction
page.content: Most of the block occupies land in the parishes of Owslebury and Colden Common.Some of the text refers to the whole block whilst some is specific to Colden Common village or to Marwell Zoological Park. The village of Colden Common,only the eastern part of which falls into this block,lies approximately 4.5 miles south of Winchester and 2.5 miles north-east of Eastleigh.Marwell Zoological Park lies some 1.5 miles east of Colden Common. Much of the information on the village was obtained from a sample survey conducted at the summer fete and outside the local shops.The results therefore refer to the whole village and not just that part included in this block.
